text: this Mother's Day let your mom know how
much you loved her with a little message
written right on to a chocolate-dipped
strawberry it's very sweet and very
tasty I have some dark chocolate and I
have some white chocolate whatever mom
likes actually it's great to have both
so you can dip in one color and pipe in
the other color this is a bittersweet
chocolate I like the deep dark chocolate
with the strawberry so I'm gonna start
with those it's melted and slightly
cooled you wanted definitely to coat the
strawberry and if you can find
strawberries with the long stem like
this that makes it really easy for
dipping you want your chocolate to be in
a bowl that's deep enough so that you
can get good strawberry well coated drag
off the excess and then right onto a
parchment-lined sheet it really is that
easy make sure you get enough coated so
you have enough room to write your
message I'll do a few in the white
chocolate okay so I'm gonna keep dipping
and then these will go into the
refrigerator to set up so the chocolate
feels to the touch nice and firm and
will take 20 minutes half an hour and
then I might have to rewarm this
chocolate at that point I'll see what
the consistency is and then it'll go
into a piping bag with a small plain tip
like a number one or a number two and we
can pipe on our messages I'll just keep
dipping and then into the fridge okay my
strawberries are chilled the chocolate
is set so now I'm just going to fill the
pastry bags with some more chocolate you
don't want the chocolate to be super hot
at this point because it'll be too runny
and too hard to pipe so let it cool down
just to the right
piping consistency too thick and it'll
be too hard to pipe so just watch it
okay use a rubber band to keep the top
secure so nothing comes out on the top I
have a white chocolate I'm gonna go on
to my dark chocolate strawberry
